starwars.swinterfaces

Class SWGridController

  • java.lang.Object
    • starwars.swinterfaces.SWGridController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridController, MapRenderer, MessageRenderer, SimulationController

    public class SWGridController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GridController
    Concrete implementation of the GridController.

    This controller calls the UI methods to render map, messages and obtain user input.

    Author:
    Asel
    See Also:
    edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld.GridController}

    • Constructor Detail

      • SWGridController

        public SWGridController(SWWorld world)
        Constructor of this SWGridController

        The constructor will initialize the grid and the user interface to be used by the controller.

        If a different User Interface (also know as a View) is to be used it must be changed in this constructor.

        Parameters:
        world - the world to be considered by the controller

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render()
        Description copied from interface: GridController
        Implementation of the MapRenderer interface that calls displayMap() method of the View (GridRenderer) in order to display the Grid on the View, in a suitable form.

        Concrete implementations of this method should never handle the display of the Grid directly. Display of the map is a responsibility of the View (GridRenderer).

        Specified by:
        render in interface GridController
        Specified by:
        render in interface MapRenderer
        See Also:
        edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.userInterface.MapRenderer#render()}, edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld.GridRenderer#displayMap()}

      • render

        public void render(java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: GridController
        Implementation of the MessageRenderer interface that calls displayMessage(String) method of the View (GridRenderer) in order to display messages on the View, in a suitable form.

        Concrete implementations of this method should never handle the display of the messages directly. Display of messages is a responsibility of the View (GridRenderer).

        Specified by:
        render in interface GridController
        Specified by:
        render in interface MessageRenderer
        Parameters:
        message - the message string to be displayed
        See Also:
        edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.userInterface.MessageRenderer#render(String)}, edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld.GridRenderer#displayMessage(String)}

      • getUserDecision

        public static SWActionInterface getUserDecision(SWActor a)
        Will return a Action selected by the user.

        This method will provide the user interface with a list of commands from which the user needs to select one from and will return this selection.

        Parameters:
        a - the SWActor for whom an Action needs to be selected
        Returns:
        the selected action for the SWActor a
